auth.systemDescription: üí° Our smart platform provides real-time insights, detailed analytics, and seamless communication between car owners and drivers. Track performance, monitor earnings, and grow your rental business with confidence!
auth.signupWelcome: üéâ Join the Revolution! Connect, Earn, and Thrive with mo kumbi
auth.serviceDescription: Drive to earn money or get detailed stats on how your car is performing. Connect drivers with car owners for smart rental management.
auth.checkEmailMessage: We've sent you a verification email. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
auth.nextStepsMessage: After verifying your email, you'll be able to complete your profile and start using mo kumbi.
auth.homeDescription: Connect drivers with car owners for smart rental management. Drive to earn money or get detailed stats on how your car is performing.
auth.platformGoalsDescription: We're designed to help keep drivers honest, build their reputation, and reduce headaches for car owners through transparent tracking and accountability.
auth.freePlatformDescription: No hidden fees, no subscription costs, no commission charges. mo kumbi is completely free for both drivers and car owners.
auth.trackProgressDescription: Monitor your earnings as a driver or fleet performance as an owner with detailed analytics and insights.
auth.viewStatisticsDescription: Get comprehensive reports and data visualization to understand your rental business performance.
auth.carPerformanceDescription: Monitor how your individual cars are performing with real-time tracking and detailed metrics.
auth.driverRecognitionDescription: Build your reputation with ratings and reviews from car owners, increasing your earning potential.
auth.driverSignup: Sign up as a Driver to start earning with rental cars assigned by owners
auth.ownerSignup: Sign up as an Owner to manage your fleet and assign drivers to maximize your rental income

auth.ownerBenefit2: Whether you drive yourself or manage others, get crystal-clear insights into your car's performance and unlock hidden profit opportunities.
auth.ownerCallToAction: Turn your fleet into a profit machine

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our car rental platform
howItWorks.driverOverview: Track your weekly earnings, mileage, and expenses for assigned vehicles. Submit detailed reports to maintain transparency with car owners.
howItWorks.ownerOverview: Manage your fleet, assign drivers, and monitor performance. Get detailed insights into your car's profitability and usage.
howItWorks.driverQ1: What do I need to do as a driver?
howItWorks.driverA1: Once a car is assigned to you, you have just one main responsibility: at the end of each week, enter your weekly report for the assigned car. This includes how much you made from ride share/taxi/rentals, how much you spent on maintenance and gas, how much you paid yourself, and your mileage for the week.
howItWorks.driverQ2: Can I communicate with the car owner?
howItWorks.driverA2: Yes! Both drivers and owners can add comments and messages to any specific weekly report. This allows for open communication about performance, expenses, or any concerns.
howItWorks.driverQ3: What if I make a mistake in my report?
howItWorks.driverA3: If you enter high weekly mileage, you'll need to justify the income that comes with it if it's low. The system helps maintain transparency by flagging inconsistencies between mileage and earnings.
howItWorks.driverQ4: How do I know which cars are more profitable for me?
howItWorks.driverA4: The platform provides statistics showing which cars could be more profitable for you based on your performance data. This helps you make informed decisions about which vehicles to drive.
howItWorks.ownerQ1: How do I get started as a car owner?
howItWorks.ownerA1: Getting started is simple: 1) Register a car that you own on the platform, 2) Ask your driver to register on the platform, 3) Assign your car to your driver. That's it! The platform handles the rest.
howItWorks.ownerQ2: How do I monitor my car's performance?
howItWorks.ownerA2: You have access to comprehensive statistics on how your car is performing. This includes detailed insights into profitability, usage patterns, and areas you should focus on to optimize your rental income.
howItWorks.ownerQ3: How does the platform keep drivers honest?
howItWorks.ownerA3: The system maintains transparency in several ways: if a driver enters high weekly mileage, they must justify the income that comes with it if it's low. Additionally, if a driver enters low mileage but actually drove more, this will be caught during quarterly inspections when the mileage on reports doesn't match the actual car's odometer.
howItWorks.ownerQ4: What kind of reports can I see?
howItWorks.ownerA4: You can view detailed weekly reports including driver earnings, maintenance expenses, gas costs, ride share income, rental income, taxi income, and mileage data. You can also add comments and messages to any report for better communication.
howItWorks.honestyDescription: Our platform uses data validation to ensure accurate reporting. High mileage entries must be justified by corresponding income levels, creating a natural check and balance system.
howItWorks.verificationDescription: Quarterly inspections catch discrepancies between reported mileage and actual vehicle odometer readings, ensuring long-term accuracy and preventing underreporting.
howItWorks.ownerStatsDescription: Get detailed statistics on how your car is performing, including profitability analysis, usage patterns, maintenance trends, and insights on areas to focus on for better returns.
howItWorks.driverStatsDescription: Access statistics showing which cars could be more profitable for you based on your performance data, helping you make informed decisions about vehicle assignments.

legal.privacyIntroduction: At mo kumbi, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our car rental platform.
legal.personalInformation: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and driver's license information when you create an account and complete your profile.
legal.usageInformation: We also collect usage information including your weekly reports, mileage data, earnings information, and communication records to provide our services effectively.
legal.useInformationDescription: We use your information to provide our car rental platform services, facilitate communication between car owners and drivers, track earnings and performance, and improve our platform's functionality.
legal.dataSharingDescription: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only with other users of the platform (car owners and drivers) as necessary to provide our services, or as required by law.
legal.dataSecurityDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption.
legal.yourRightsDescription: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also request a copy of your data or withdraw your consent for data processing at any time.
legal.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our platform or email us at support@mokumbi.com.
legal.agreementDescription: By using mo kumbi, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.
legal.acceptableUseDescription: You agree to use our platform responsibly and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. You must provide accurate information and maintain the security of your account.
legal.prohibitedActivities: Prohibited activities include providing false information, attempting to hack or compromise the platform, or using the service for illegal purposes.
legal.accountResponsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
legal.accountSecurity: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
legal.serviceAvailabilityDescription: We strive to provide continuous service availability, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may temporarily suspend the service for maintenance or updates.
legal.liabilityDescription: mo kumbi is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform, including but not limited to lost profits or data.
legal.terminationDescription: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion.
legal.changesToTermsDescription: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Request
dataDeletion.description: We respect your privacy and your right to have your personal data deleted. If you would like to request the deletion of your personal data from our platform, please follow the instructions below.
dataDeletion.step1: Send an email to our technical team
dataDeletion.step2: Include your full name and email address
dataDeletion.step3: Specify that you want your data deleted
dataDeletion.step4: We will process your request within 7 business days
dataDeletion.whatToInclude: What to Include in Your Request
dataDeletion.include1: Your full name as registered on the platform
dataDeletion.include2: The email address associated with your account
dataDeletion.include3: A clear statement requesting data deletion
dataDeletion.timeline: We will process your data deletion request within 7 business days of receiving your email. You will receive a confirmation email once your data has been successfully deleted.
